description: A magical match-3 puzzle game where players combine mystical gems to create powerful combinations and progress through an enchanted world.

matching.description: Match 3 or more identical gems in horizontal or vertical lines

specialMatches.5gems: Creates an explosive gem that clears surrounding area
specialMatches.Lshape: Creates a color-bomb that clears all gems of one color

powerUps.name: Color Bomb
powerUps.effect: Removes all gems of a selected color

powerUps.name: Lightning Gem

difficulty.curve: Gradual increase with periodic relief levels

powerUps.specialCombinations: Combining power gems creates epic effects

monetization.primary: Free to play with in-app purchases

visualStyle.artStyle: Bright, colorful, with magical particle effects

uniqueSellingPoints: Strategic depth through special gem creation
